page.title: 14READATHON
page.content: During the first half-term of the summer term some 160 pupils of {Holywell V.C. Middle School}took part in a Readathon :a sponsored read. This event was so successful that around Â£810 was raised for the{World Wildlife {Fund. On 12th July the actress{Carol {Drinkwater}from the popular television series "All Creatures Great And Small" visited the School to recieve a cheque from the pupils that took part. The cheque was presented by the two children who raised the most money; Bryony Melrose and Hamish Healey. Carol Drinkwater was accompanied by a lady from the World Wildlife Fund who answered the many questions put to her by the children. She also presented the School with a book on bird wildlife. Reports and photographs appeared in the local press.
